name: (UN)BREAKABLE (AlanOixDeCoco, Barna_bus, judefra1se, sangagin)
description:
You are (un)breakable!

Don't "break" your mind by completing this short but intense jam game!

It has been made in 48h (in fact we slept a bit sooo...) for the 2023's edition of the Emotional Game Jam.

We are the Emotional Team Play Alliance (there may be some sort of abreviation here), and we are proud to present you (UN)BREAKABLE!
